header.title: From a post made in response to questions from the Casting the Circle (Luciferian version).

central_thesis: This text outlines a Luciferian framework for understanding and invoking elemental forces and archetypal entities (Lucifer, Leviathan, Shaitan, Belial) within a magical circle. It reinterprets traditional elemental and directional associations to emphasize internal awakening, self-mastery, and personal Gnosis as central to the 'BECOME' process in Luciferian Witchcraft.

structure_content.chapter_title: Lucifer: The Morning Star and Eastern Principle
structure_content.summary: Lucifer is positioned in the East, embodying the morning star. His specific descriptions and associated elements are detailed in Michael Ford's other works, 'Shades of Algol' and 'Sabbatic Sorcery'. The true meaning of Lucifer's SIGIL is accessible through initiation, underscoring an experiential rather than purely academic understanding.

structure_content.chapter_title: Leviathan: The Dweller of the Threshold and Western Waters
structure_content.summary: Leviathan typically presides in the West and is associated with water. This text expands his role to include an Earth-based aspect, symbolizing the 'swallowing of souls' and functioning as the 'Dweller of the Threshold' for achieving Earth Mastery. Leviathan represents the transformation of the subconscious (WATER) into conscious control of elements (EARTH), allowing the practitioner to become a 'Crowned avatar'.

structure_content.chapter_title: Shaitan: The Shadow, Gnosis, and Catalyst for Becoming
structure_content.summary: Shaitan is presented as the 'Shadow of Lucifer' and 'Noctifer', the Bringer of Night, representing the balance inherent in the Demonic. This entity facilitates manifestation through controlled desire and an awakened mind. Shaitan is crucial for Luciferian Witchcraft, requiring 'Hedge Riding' and the awakening of both Angelick and Demonic aspects. Shaitan embodies the elemental shift from Water to Air, signifying a 'dual Luciferian Gnosis' driving the 'sorcerous intent, to BECOME'.

structure_content.chapter_title: Belial: Fire, Manifestation, and Awakened Will
structure_content.summary: Belial embodies the element of FIRE, governing manifestation, creation, and destruction. While linked to Satan or Shaitan, Belial's role here focuses on controlling personal elements and achieving goals through the combination of Fire and Earth. He is identified with figures like Beast 666 and John Whiteside Parsons' 'BELARION Armilusss Al Dajjal Antichrist', and is seen as the Angel of awakening inspiration, kindred to Lucifer, enabling the materialization of one's Will.

structure_content.chapter_title: Enochian Angels: Supplemental Research for Context
structure_content.summary: The text briefly notes that the Angels referenced in the rite are Enochian, suggesting that further research into their specific elemental connections will yield valuable insights for practitioners, indicating a potential layer of traditional angelic magic integrated into this Luciferian system.

key_concepts.definition: The morning star, presiding in the East. Its meaning and SIGIL are revealed through initiatory experience, as detailed in Ford's 'Shades of Algol' and 'Sabbatic Sorcery'.

Primarily associated with Water and the West, Leviathan is reinterpreted as the 'Dweller of the Threshold' facilitating 'Earth Mastery'. It represents the integration of subconscious (WATER) into conscious elemental control (EARTH) to become a 'Crowned avatar'.

The 'Shadow of Lucifer' and 'Bringer of Night', representing the balance of the Demonic. It enables manifestation through awakened consciousness and embodies the 'dual Luciferian Gnosis' of Water to Air, crucial for the process of 'BECOME' in Luciferian Witchcraft.

The elemental force of FIRE, responsible for manifestation, creation, and destruction. Associated with success via Fire-with-Earth, linked to historical Antichrist figures, and serving as the 'Angel of awakening inspiration' for actualizing one's Will, akin to Lucifer.

A practice requiring 'Hedge Riding' and the detailed awakening of both 'Angelick and Demonic' aspects within the practitioner, aimed at achieving personal Gnosis and ultimate self-transformation ('BECOME').

A profound, experiential understanding facilitated by Shaitan, specifically described as the transformation from Water to Air, which empowers the sorcerous intent towards self-realization and 'BECOME'.
The ultimate goal of the Luciferian path, signifying self-deification, complete self-mastery, and the full actualization of one's sorcerous intent and Will.

practical_system.description: The practical system is a Luciferian method for casting a magical circle, integrating elemental forces and archetypal entities (Lucifer, Leviathan, Shaitan, Belial) into a framework for self-transformation. It emphasizes aligning the magician's consciousness and Will with these reinterpreted principles to achieve elemental mastery and personal Gnosis, culminating in the state of 'BECOME'. The system encourages an experiential approach, where the practitioner actively engages with these forces to manifest their desires and awaken their inner potential.
tools: The 'SIGIL of Lucifer' (meaning derived through initiation).
Concepts and principles detailed in 'Shades of Algol' and 'Sabbatic Sorcery'.
Internalized elemental associations and directional alignments.
rituals: Casting the Circle (Luciferian version) using directional and elemental invocations of Lucifer, Leviathan, Shaitan, and Belial.
Practicing 'Hedge Riding' as a prerequisite for Luciferian Witchcraft.
Engaging in practices that facilitate the 'detailed awakening of both the Angelick and Demonic' aspects of the self.
Working towards a 'dual Luciferian Gnosis' (Water to Air transformation) to enable sorcerous intent.

relevant_quotes.text: Lucifer is East, presiding as the morning star.

Leviathan becomes essentially the Dweller of the Threshold for our consistancy of developing Earth Mastery, it becomes WATER (subconscious, unconscious psyche) to EARTH (the commanding of the elements, or the Witch Queen or King as the Crowned avatar).
Shaitan is behind primarily to present a varied opinion of the Opposer, which is essentially the Shadow of Lucifer itself. It is also known as Noctifer, the Bringer of Night.
Belial represents in this aspect FIRE, being manifestation, creation and destruction.
Luciferian Witchcraft demands a Hedge Riding ability along with the detailed awakening of both the Angelick and Demonic.
Belial is the Angel of awakening inspiration and the ability to make its Will flesh, a kin to Lucifer.

critical_analysis.relevance: This text offers a concise yet potent glimpse into Michael Ford's distinct Luciferian magical system, specifically concerning the casting of a circle and the nature of its elemental princes. It deviates from standard ceremonial magic by emphasizing internal, psychological, and transformative aspects of these entities, recontextualizing them for personal gnosis and self-deification. It is highly relevant for practitioners seeking a Left Hand Path approach to elemental magic and self-empowerment, particularly those engaged with contemporary occult currents that prioritize individual Will and becoming.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The target audience includes experienced practitioners of Luciferianism, Witchcraft, and other Left Hand Path traditions, particularly those familiar with Michael Ford's previous works. It is intended for individuals interested in deep, operative magic focused on self-transformation, elemental mastery, and the integration of both 'Angelick and Demonic' aspects of consciousness, rather than novice occultists or those adhering strictly to traditional grimoire magic.
